verses.verse: Now it came <WH1961> about when <WH9201> the wall <WH2346> was rebuilt <WH1129> and I had set <WH5975> up the doors, <WH1817> and the gatekeepers <WH7778> and the singers <WH7891> and the Levites <WH3881> were appointed, <WH6485>

that I put <WH6680> Hanani <WH2607> my brother, <WH251> and Hananiah <WH2608> the commander <WH8269> of the fortress, <WH1002> in charge <WH5921> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> for he was a faithful <WH571> man <WH376> and feared <WH3372> God <WH430> more <WH4480> than <WH4480> many. <WH7227>

Then I said <WH559> to them, "Do not let the gates <WH8179> of Jerusalem <WH3389> be opened <WH6605> until <WH5704> the sun <WH8121> is hot, <WH2552> and while <WH5704> they are standing <WH5975> [guard,] let them shut <WH1479> and bolt <WH270> the doors. <WH1817> Also appoint <WH5975> guards <WH4931> from the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> each <WH376> at his post, <WH4929> and each <WH376> in front <WH5048> of his own house. <WH1004>"
Now the city <WH5892> was large <WH7342> <WH3027> and spacious, <WH1419> but the people <WH5971> in it were few <WH4592> and the houses <WH1004> were not built. <WH1129>

Then my God <WH430> put <WH5414> it into my heart <WH3820> to assemble <WH6908> the nobles, <WH2715> the officials, <WH5461> and the people <WH5971> to be enrolled <WH3187> by genealogies. <WH3187> Then I found <WH4672> the book <WH5612> of the genealogy <WH3188> of those who came <WH5927> up first <WH7223> in which I found <WH4672> the following record: <WH3789>

These <WH428> are the people <WH1121> of the province <WH4082> who came <WH5927> up from the captivity <WH7628> of the exiles <WH1473> whom <WH834> Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> had carried <WH1540> away, <WH1540> and who returned <WH7725> to Jerusalem <WH3389> and Judah, <WH3063> each <WH376> to his city, <WH5892>

who came <WH935> with Zerubbabel, <WH2216> Jeshua, <WH3091> Nehemiah, <WH5166> Azariah, <WH5838> Raamiah, <WH7485> Nahamani, <WH5167> Mordecai, <WH4782> Bilshan, <WH1114> Mispereth, <WH4559> Bigvai, <WH902> Nehum, <WH5149> Baanah. <WH1196> The number <WH4557> of men <WH376> of the people <WH5971> of Israel: <WH3478>
the sons <WH1121> of Parosh, <WH6551> 2172;
the sons <WH1121> of Shephatiah, <WH8203> 372;
the sons <WH1121> of Arah, <WH733> 652;
the sons <WH1121> of Pahath-moab of the sons <WH1121> of Jeshua <WH3091> and Joab, <WH3097> 2818;
the sons <WH1121> of Elam, <WH9405> 1254;
the sons <WH1121> of Zattu, <WH2240> 845;
the sons <WH1121> of Zaccai, <WH2140> 760;
the sons <WH1121> of Binnui, <WH1131> 648;
the sons <WH1121> of Bebai, <WH893> 628;
the sons <WH1121> of Azgad, <WH5803> 2322;
the sons <WH1121> of Adonikam, <WH140> 667;
the sons <WH1121> of Bigvai, <WH902> 2067;
the sons <WH1121> of Adin, <WH5720> 655;
the sons <WH1121> of Ater, <WH333> of Hezekiah, <WH2396> 98 <WH8673>; <WH8083>
the sons <WH1121> of Hashum, <WH2828> 328;
the sons <WH1121> of Bezai, <WH1209> 324;
the sons <WH1121> of Hariph, <WH2756> 112;
the sons <WH1121> of Gibeon, <WH1391> 95 <WH8673> 2568;
the men <WH376> of Bethlehem <WH1035> and Netophah, <WH5199> 188;
the men <WH376> of Anathoth, <WH6068> 128;
the men <WH376> of Beth-azmaveth, <WH42> <WH705> 8147;
the men <WH376> of Kiriath-jearim, Chephirah, <WH3716> and Beeroth, <WH881> 743;
the men <WH376> of Ramah <WH7414> and Geba, <WH1387> 621;
the men <WH376> of Michmas, <WH4363> 122;
the men <WH376> of Bethel <WH1008> and Ai, <WH5857> 123;
the men <WH376> of the other <WH312> Nebo, <WH5015> 52 <WH2572> 8147;
the sons <WH1121> of the other <WH312> Elam, <WH9405> 1254;
the sons <WH1121> of Harim, <WH2766> 320;
the men <WH1121> of Jericho, <WH3405> 345;
the sons <WH1121> of Lod, <WH3850> Hadid, <WH2307> and Ono, <WH207> 721;
the sons <WH1121> of Senaah, <WH5570> 3930.
The priests: <WH3548> the sons <WH1121> of Jedaiah <WH3048> of the house <WH1004> of Jeshua, <WH3091> 973;
the sons <WH1121> of Immer, <WH564> 1052;
the sons <WH1121> of Pashhur, <WH6583> 1247;
the sons <WH1121> of Harim, <WH2766> 1017.
The Levites: <WH3881> the sons <WH1121> of Jeshua, <WH3091> of Kadmiel, <WH6934> of the sons <WH1121> of Hodevah, <WH1937> 74. <WH7657> <WH702>
The singers: <WH7891> the sons <WH1121> of Asaph, <WH623> 148.

The gatekeepers: <WH7778> the sons <WH1121> of Shallum, <WH7967> the sons <WH1121> of Ater, <WH333> the sons <WH1121> of Talmon, <WH2929> the sons <WH1121> of Akkub, <WH6126> the sons <WH1121> of Hatita, <WH2410> the sons <WH1121> of Shobai, <WH7630> 138.
The temple <WH5411> servants: <WH5411> the sons <WH1121> of Ziha, <WH6727> the sons <WH1121> of Hasupha, <WH2817> the sons <WH1121> of Tabbaoth, <WH2884>
the sons <WH1121> of Keros, <WH7026> the sons <WH1121> of Sia, <WH5517> the sons <WH1121> of Padon, <WH6303>
the sons <WH1121> of Lebana, <WH3838> the sons <WH1121> of Hagaba, <WH2286> the sons <WH1121> of Shalmai, <WH8014>
the sons <WH1121> of Hanan, <WH2605> the sons <WH1121> of Giddel, <WH1435> the sons <WH1121> of Gahar, <WH1515>
the sons <WH1121> of Reaiah, <WH7211> the sons <WH1121> of Rezin, <WH7526> the sons <WH1121> of Nekoda, <WH5353>
the sons <WH1121> of Gazzam, <WH1502> the sons <WH1121> of Uzza, <WH5798> the sons <WH1121> of Paseah, <WH6454>
the sons <WH1121> of Besai, <WH1153> the sons <WH1121> of Meunim, <WH4586> the sons <WH1121> of Nephushesim, <WH5304>
the sons <WH1121> of Bakbuk, <WH1227> the sons <WH1121> of Hakupha, <WH2709> the sons <WH1121> of Harhur, <WH2744>
the sons <WH1121> of Bazlith, <WH1213> the sons <WH1121> of Mehida, <WH4240> the sons <WH1121> of Harsha, <WH2797>
the sons <WH1121> of Barkos, <WH1302> the sons <WH1121> of Sisera, <WH5516> the sons <WH1121> of Temah, <WH8547>
the sons <WH1121> of Neziah, <WH5335> the sons <WH1121> of Hatipha. <WH2412>
The sons <WH1121> of Solomon's servants: <WH5650> the sons <WH1121> of Sotai, <WH5479> the sons <WH1121> of Sophereth, <WH5618> the sons <WH1121> of Perida, <WH6514>
the sons <WH1121> of Jaala, <WH3279> the sons <WH1121> of Darkon, <WH1874> the sons <WH1121> of Giddel, <WH1435>
the sons <WH1121> of Shephatiah, <WH8203> the sons <WH1121> of Hattil, <WH2411> the sons <WH1121> of Pochereth-hazzebaim, the sons <WH1121> of Amon. <WH526>
All <WH3605> the temple <WH5411> servants <WH5411> and the sons <WH1121> of Solomon's servants <WH5650> [were] 392.

And these <WH428> [were] they who came <WH5927> up from Tel-melah, Tel-harsha, Cherub, <WH3743> Addon, <WH114> and Immer; <WH564> but they could <WH3201> not show <WH5046> their fathers' houses <WH1004> or their descendants, <WH2233> whether <WH518> they were of Israel: <WH3478>
the sons <WH1121> of Delaiah, <WH1806> the sons <WH1121> of Tobiah, <WH2900> the sons <WH1121> of Nekoda, <WH5353> 642.

And of the priests: <WH3548> the sons <WH1121> of Hobaiah, <WH2252> the sons <WH1121> of Hakkoz, <WH6976> the sons <WH1121> of Barzillai, <WH1271> who <WH834> took <WH3947> a wife <WH802> of the daughters <WH1323> of Barzillai, <WH1271> the Gileadite, <WH1569> and was named <WH7121> <WH8034> after <WH5921> them.

These <WH428> searched <WH1245> [among] their ancestral <WH3187> registration, <WH3791> <WH3187> but it could not be located; <WH4672> therefore they were considered unclean <WH1351> [and excluded] from the priesthood. <WH3550>

And the governor <WH8660> said <WH559> to them that they should not eat <WH398> from the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> things <WH6944> until <WH5704> a priest <WH3548> arose <WH5975> with Urim <WH224> and Thummim. <WH8550>
The whole <WH3605> assembly <WH6951> together <WH259> [was] 42360,
besides <WH4480> <WH905> their male <WH5650> and their female <WH519> servants, <WH5650> <WH519> of whom <WH428> [there were] 7337; and they had <WH245> male and female singers. <WH7891>
Their horses <WH5483> were 736; their mules, <WH6505> 245;
[their] camels, <WH1581> 435; [their] donkeys, <WH2543> 6720.

And some <WH4480> from among the heads <WH7218> of fathers' [households] gave <WH5414> to the work. <WH4399> The governor <WH8660> gave <WH5414> to the treasury <WH214> 1000 gold <WH2091> drachmas, <WH1871> 50 <WH2572> basins, <WH4219> 530 priests' garments. <WH3801>

And some <WH4480> of the heads <WH7218> of fathers' [households] gave <WH5414> into the treasury <WH214> of the work <WH4399> 20000 gold <WH2091> drachmas, <WH1871> and 2200 silver <WH3701> minas. <WH4488>

And that which <WH834> the rest <WH7611> of the people <WH5971> gave <WH5414> was 20000 gold <WH2091> drachmas <WH1871> and 2000 silver <WH3701> minas, <WH4488> and 67 <WH8346> <WH7651> priests' garments. <WH3801>

Now the priests, <WH3548> the Levites, <WH3881> the gatekeepers, <WH7778> the singers, <WH7891> some <WH4480> of the people, <WH5971> the temple <WH5411> servants, <WH5411> and all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> lived <WH3427> in their cities. <WH5892> And when the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> came, <WH5060> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> [were] in their cities. <WH5892>
